txt.en: 'Our scouts just sent word - we are being attacked! Kûr Anzar is under assault from All-seeing forces eager to reclaim her. We must go at once to Kûr Anzar's aid. For the Queen!'
You have successfully repelled the assault by the vile Barkhûshim! Return with the scout to Udlanu in Urmâkh with this report.
There is no twist in this mission.
The Barkhûshim are attacking Kûr Anzar! Your mission is to destroy their makeshift fortifications and repel them from Kûr Anzar.
'Thank you for your valour on the battlefield this day. Kûr Anzar and all of Renewed Hamât owes you a debt for all you did to repel the Barkhûshim invaders.'
'Quickly! We must aid Kûr Anzar in her hour of need!'
The Barkhûshim are attacking Kûr Anzar! Your mission is to destroy their makeshift fortifications and repel them from the lower ward of Kûr Anzar.\n\nSpeak to Udlanu to travel.
